example.description:
This example returns the details of the lamda_exec_role. It includes the trust policy document that specifies who can assume this role. The policy document is URL encoded and can be decoded using the .NET UrlDecode method. In this example, the original policy had all white space removed before it was uploaded to the policy.
To see the permissions policy documents that determine what someone who assumes the role can do, use the Get-IAMRolePolicy for inline policies, and Get-IAMPolicyVersion for attached managed policies.
